Interface Worker2Worker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Worker2WorkerProxy

    public interface Worker2Worker
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface for the workers to communicate between them
    Author:
    Prakash Chandrasekaran, Gautham Narayanasamy, Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
